member.name: T:DAX.CIM.PhysicalNetworkModel.FeederInfo.FeederInfo
member.summary: Fat class to hold simplified/flatten-out feeder information that many non-electrical external systems are hungry for.

member.name: M:DAX.CIM.PhysicalNetworkModel.FeederInfo.FeederInfo.CreateFeederInfosFromEquipment(DAX.CIM.PhysicalNetworkModel.FeederInfo.FeederInfoContext,DAX.CIM.PhysicalNetworkModel.Equipment)
member.summary: Creates one or more feeder Ã­nfo objects for a given PNM equipment object. If the PNM object is not feeded, a feeder info object with NoFeed = true is returned. If the PNM object is multi feeded, a feeder into object with MultiFeed = true is returned for each source feeding the object.
